title: TERRAIN & LINE OF SIGHT
text:
'I could sense their presence - those damned things that watched us from the shadows. They thought they had staged the perfect ambush. Little did they know, we had staged one of our own. I signalled to Allandir and Brok , who were hidden in the undergrowth, that the enemy had fallen into our trap. Victory was ours for the taking.'

- Isabel, Avatar of Ista.
